mutants.code:
import pandas as pd

def merge_rows(df):
    merged_rows = []
    for i in range(1, len(df), 3):
        merged_rows.append(', '.join(df['text'].iloc[i:i + 3]))
    result = pd.DataFrame({'text': merged_rows})
    return result
